long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you constantly have to scroll long pages in the Internet with a mouse? Now for you there is a solution with the help of an extension for chrome.

This extension is unique, since you do not need to aim at the button to climb up or down. This scroll is located on the entire length of the page. Which you can rearrange to the left or right side convenient for you. It is transparent and has different scrolling speeds.

This version is betta.
